ygData.subject: RE: Re: Undead drops in Kithicor
ygData.msgSnippet: I think that it does have something to do with it.  I read plenty of posts on alt.games.everquest from characters who were furious about dying due to the
ygData.messageBody:
I think that it does have something to do with it. I read plenty of posts
on alt.games.everquest from characters who were furious about dying due to
the massive undead spawns. Unfortunate....

Desmei Sightblinder
Lvl 30 Bard [Povar]

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Cranfill, Wendy [mailto:Wendy_Cranfill@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, November 02, 1999 1:30 PM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Undead drops in Kithicor
>
>
> From: "Cranfill, Wendy" <Wendy_Cranfill@...>
>
> On Solusek Ro last night, someone in my party
> talked to a gm
> and apparently the undead spawn in Kithicor was cancelled because the
> newbies were complaining about dying. Don't know how true this is but
> perhaps it is why they stopped the spawn.
>
> Tani 16th Bard
> Halana 33rd Shaman
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Jason Rochelle
> [mailto:Jasroc@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, November 02,
> 1999 1:05 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Re:
> Undead drops
> in Kithicor
>
> From: Jason Rochelle <Jasroc@...>
>
> I went thru kithicor today and
> ... no more
> undead.
>
> As for what they dropped yesterday, the
> NORMAL undead spawns dropped
> "Tainted" weapons of all
> varieties, (1hs,
> 2hs, piercing, 1hb, 2hb) the
> only one I heard stats on was:
>
> Tainted Rapier, Piercing, Dam 19 delay
> 5,several +5 stat bonuses and
> -5sv disease.
>
> All the weapons were no-drop,
> and I didn't
> get a chance at any of them.
>
> Side note: everyone in the zone
> was saying
> "I hope hope leave it this
> way forever" just like last week in Lake
> rathe when the pets were
> spawning like crazy and
> everypne was saying
> "I hope it stays this way".
> TWO examples of people LOVING a
> zone, BOTH
> of which Verant KABONG'ed.
> Makes you wonder if they really WANT us
> happy.
>
>
> Uldar Ulfangson
> 25th bard, Rodcet Nife
>
